jump_scares.spoiler: An infected lunges out from a doorway
Guzman appears behind Angela

Anciana, as an infected, suddenly screams
An infected is revealed behind the door

A monkey appears and shrieks
One of the captives gets dragged away suddenly
A man with a disfigured face comes up from behind the woman
A man’s face turns to a skeleton
The man with the crow mask’s face distorts with a loud sound in the background
Some kids throw eggs at the house and they suddenly splatter at the window
A door suddenly slams
An alien creature appears in front of the camera
The alien finds the woman hiding
The clown runs out from the side of the gas station
The clown appears in front of the woman’s car window
The woman turns the driver over to see that it’s a man with a severely disfigured face
The woman raises her head to see the clown right in front of her
The video suddenly zooms in on the clown’s face
Candyman slits Jerrica’s throat
Trapped in a mirrored elevator, Anthony looks up and sees Candyman
In pitch black darkness, Sherman suddenly turns his flashlight on as Brianna screams
The dogs body opens up and blood sprays out
The boy grabs Paul’s hand and bites it
A truck suddenly drives by behind the boy
Bert accidentally discharges his rifle
A man appears in Bert’s line of fire
A man appears, accompanied by a loud sound cue
A bloodied man appears at the front door, pleading for help
Marcy screams as a hand touches her shoulder
The police officer suddenly turns around and points her gun
Marcy shoots at the dog
Karen, who is very sick, appears
A woman with a rifle appears

There is an abrupt cut to Nica picturing herself attacking Angela and Claire
Chucky smashes a bottle over Foley’s head
An image of Chucky’s mangled face flashes across the screen twice (accompanied by a piercing sound effect)

Madeleine stands up and a nurse is standing right behind her
There is a sudden cut to Chucky with his arm in Madeleine’s mouth
Foley falls back and Chucky hits him over the head with a bottle
Tiffany suddenly appears behind the police officer looking in her car

A possessed Linda pops up in front of Ash
Ash lifts his head out of a puddle and screams, showing that he is possessed himself

Linda’s head falls into Ash’s lap
Headless Linda bursts into the shed holding a chainsaw
Ash sees himself in the mirror  the mirror Ash comes out of the mirror and grabs him
The scene abruptly cuts to Ash’s possessed hand
Ash stabs his own hand with a knife
Jake jumps at Ash

Henrietta’s horribly contorted face pokes through the cellar door
Ed is possessed and screams from behind Annie
There is a loud roaring noise
Jake and Bobby Joe break through a door
A possessed tree roars at Bobby Joe
Ash becomes possessed once more and lets out a roar
Possessed Ash appears at the cabin door

Henrietta pops out of the cellar door and drags Jake into the cellar
Annie walks into possessed Ash
Ash ducks out of the way as Annie swings an axe at him
The skeleton of Jake appears beside Ash
Henrietta grabs Ash through the cellar stairs
Henrietta rises up out of a hole in the floor
There is a loud boom and a tree branch falls on the cabin
The physical incarnation of evil appears in the cabin doorway
Cooper jumps at Don and barks after he calls for him
Don opens his eyes to find a girl with a distorted face over him
The doorbell unexpectedly rings during a quiet scene
The girl looks up at the camera and shrieks
Liz sees an eye in the drain
A bloodied woman suddenly appears at the window of a car
Marie closes a cabinet and in the reflection of the mirror Alex suddenly appears
As Alex lies sleeping a bloodied hand reaches out to touch her hair
Alex’s mother suddenly gasps as Marie reaches out to touch her
The gas station attendant gets a bottle of liquor out of a chiller. When he turns around the killer is standing right behind him
The killer comes up behind Marie and puts a bag over her head
The apparently dead killer suddenly grabs Marie around the throat
Alex looks at Marie through a one way mirror, suddenly Alex turns around and reaches for her
Lauren grabs Michael from behind
Someone whispers “Lauren” and then Eric is seen going into the ceiling
Several more possessed people are seen outside the window
She is surrounded by possessed people
Frank turns around and a door window shatters
The lights suddenly come on and a man jumps out from behind a box
Frank turns to his left and sees a man running at him
Several children jump out in front of the girls
After closing her eyes Lorna is jumped by two men
As the make-up man and Whitney are looking at each other, Whitney suddenly bites him
While Beth is turning around, Stuart suddenly punches her
As Stuart is saying “You’re a stupid f’ing c**t” he is interrupted by Beth suddenly pulling his schlong out
Some children appear in front of Josh and Paxton
A shrouded figure grabs Josh in the museum
A car suddenly crashes into the back of Kylie’s car
The driver of the white car walks up to Kylie’s window, accompanied with a loud musical sting
The computer that Kylie’s using, short-circuits
The freezer makes a mechanical noise, startling Kylie
A statue of Jesus wrapped in a white sheet stumbles and falls towards Kylie
After Kylie’s ankle bracelet beeps, grabbing her attention, a diseased-looking hand comes out from under a piece of furniture and grabs her leg
While she’s in the shower, Kylie crouches and is then attacked by the possessed teddy bear, accompanied by a loud musical sting
Graham startles Kylie while she’s dancing
The lights come back on and a veiled figure suddenly appears besides Dennis, accompanied by a loud musical stinger
While Amos is trying to look through the presumed killer’s window, Kylie suddenly opens it from inside, startling Amos in the process, accompanied by a musical stinger
The flash from Amos’s camera reveals the presumed killer’s silhouette standing behind a window, staring at Amos. This is accompanied by a loud musical stinger
The burned teddy bear in the back of Amos’s car suddenly starts to speak and startles him, accompanied by a musical stinger
Eugene slams into the door of the pick-up truck just as Kylie closes it. Accompanied by a musical stinger
Kylie turns around and Miriam suddenly appears in front of her
A sudden scene transition from a silent scene to Kylie loudly and violently opening a kitchen shelf may startle some viewers
Dennis suddenly goes on the attack, accompanied by a musical stinger
Miriam opens a cupboard in the bathroom and Eugene stumbles out of it, prompting both of them to scream. Close-up on Miriam’s face as she’s screaming. Accompanied by a musical stinger
After stabbing Eugene through the wall, Dennis suddenly kicks down the wall
Dennis suddenly comes out of frame and punches Kylie unconscious
A man appears in front of the car and gets hit
For the next one-and-a-half-minutes there is a fast montage of flashy, sometimes scary looking images
The body-double suddenly opens his eyes
There is a sudden cut to a man shooting a vase
A sudden cut to a closeup of the zombie’s face in a flashback
Buzzer’s severed head suddenly opens eyes
The church employee taps Noddy on the shoulder from behind, startling him
The motorcycle suddenly traps the priest’s fingers
The surface of the motorcycle’s fuel tank reacts to holy water
The motorcycle breaks through the window
Three syringes drop down from a chain in front of where Ryan is standing
A pitchfork lands near Mitch while he is trapped in the grain silo
At Eleanor’s storage unit – Halloran turns the light on and the shredded body of Mitch suddenly drops down in front of him
Back in his house – Logan turns around and sees Eleanor standing there watching him
As Anna attempts to escape, a figure wearing a pig mask appears and stabs her with a syringe
As Logan backs away from Eleanor he is suddenly grabbed by Halloran
An unseen person stabs Halloran with a syringe as he looks for Eleanor
Ani suddenly shoots Kate
Accompanied by a loud noise, a figure runs behind Lucie
An emaciated arm comes out from underneath the bed
The old emaciated woman on the bed suddenly screams and reaches out for Lucie
A man is shot as he answers the door
A young man is suddenly shot
Lucie sees the old emaciated woman in the kitchen
The old woman jumps on Lucie
Lucie slowly opens the door and is once again attacked by the old woman
Anna looks in the mirror and sees the mother looking at her
The old woman slides out from behind the bathtub
A sudden flashback, accompanied by the loud metallic noise of a door opening may startle some viewers
Lucie appears in the hallway as Anna tries to help the mother to the door
The chain on the floor suddenly moves
Anna shines the torch on a mutilated, chained up woman
A woman is suddenly shot
A man is thrown backwards through a door, hitting a wall
A sudden sound of a blender coming from the kitchen
A TV suddenly turns on
A shadowy figure suddenly attacks Derek

Maddie suddenly appears at the window
A body with a bloodied face falls from the ceiling
Accompanied by a screech, a mysterious figure can be seen downstairs suddenly running from one side to the other
As Madison turns after putting clothes in the washer, a screaming woman suddenly appears on the other side of the washer door glass
As the prisoner tries to cut her ropes, a trophy/dagger is thrown landing in a wooden post and just missing her face
A shadowy figure suddenly appears
A carriage suddenly moves, accompanied by a sound
Gabriel suddenly jumps down from his hiding place
An escaping woman falls through the attic floor
As Madison shouts and gets angry, the lights in the interrogation room explode
A lot of light bulbs in the police station explode all at once
The hospital security guard’s pacemaker explodes out of his chest
A door slams shut
There is a sudden bang on the door
A teenage boy jumps out with a gas mask on and  growling to scare Sarah
The same teenage boy is suddenly stabbed all the way from the back of his head and out through his eye socket, pushing his eyeball out
Sarah is suddenly grabbed from behind
Harry Ward is shot from behind just as he was about to attack Tom
‘Frank The Trucker’ opens his cab door, only to see Harry Ward in the cab, immediately followed by Harry Stabbing Frank through the top of his skull
A sudden sound cue and visual of pool balls being hit
Tom turns around and is suddenly attacked by Harry Ward

Harry Ward suddenly appears and attacks Ben Foley

Harry’s shadow appears on the wall
A miner’s uniform suddenly falls
Harry ward suddenly appears
Tom swings a pick-axe at his rescuer, stabbing him through the head

A mutilated dead body suddenly pops up out of the water onto Sheriff Forester’s back
A fish embryo inside an egg suddenly starts moving
A Piranha suddenly bites the diver’s hand
Piranhas suddenly appear, chasing a girl in the water
The girl who was parasailing is lifted out of the water revealing her missing legs and mutilated body
A girl being carried out of the water, suddenly splits in two

A blast of air comes from the fireplace
The hand of the corpse moves
A loud noise plays
Jonas removes a sheet covering a dead person
Obi puts his hand up to the glass window of the oven as he burns alive
Obi’s hand reaches through the broken oven window
Amanda turns around and bumps into Jonas

Cecil suddenly pops up at a window, startling Jill
Cecil bursts through the door, injuring Jill in the process

John suddenly grabs Jill’s hand
The phone rings during a scene transition
Laura screams and falls back in her chair
The camera flashes to Laura on the ground with a loud soundtrack noise

The phone rings suddenly again
Rose awakens abruptly from a nightmare
The demon abruptly screams at Rose during a tense scene
The camera cuts to a smiling partygoer standing very close to Rose with an accompanying sound effect
The demon screams Rose’s name and the scene abruptly changes
The scene cuts to a mangled cadaver
Holly’s head unnaturally drops from her shoulders and dangles in front of the car window
The demon grabs Rose’s face and proceeds to scream
The doctor knocks on Rose’s car window, startling her
The camera cuts back to the doctor who is now replaced by a smiling Carl with blood dripping from his mouth
Rose’s mother yells her name
The demon grabs the door that Rose is trying to close
The demon appears behind Rose and throws her against the wall
Joel begins running at Rose with an associated loud sound effect
Rose turns to see she is back at her childhood home

movies.title: Spiral: From the Book of Saw

jump_scares.spoiler: The camera cuts back from the mannequin to the cop to reveal a man in a pig mask who suddenly attacks him
Fitch quickly removes the cloak to reveal a pig mask underneath
As Fitch is walking away, he is jumped by the man in the pig mask
After showing the spiral for a few seconds, there is a loud glitch sound and the video cuts away to a pig doll
Zeke opens the car door and a dead pig falls out, startling him
The camera pans around the room to reveal the man in the pig mask in front of Angie
There is a sudden loud cut from Zeke sitting in his car to him screaming
As Zeke walks out the door, he is attacked by the man in the pig mask
Marcus turns back around and is jumped by the man in the pig mask
The disfigured woman suddenly attacks the TV host
Tara backs into a woman standing behind her

Accompanied by a sound effect, the clown suddenly looks towards where Tara is hiding
